ing: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
n: Avocado Corn Salad with Pine Nuts
des: "This is a great salad to go with just about any meal. It's very quick and easy to make, and it tastes delicious."
ins: In a large bowl, mix the lettuce, corn, avocado, and tomatoes. Drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with pine nuts. Toss and serve.
